title: Which stream should I take in 11th if I get good marks in science, but like maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hmm.. Deciding a stream is something that make us feel like we are grown ups now!!!! Can take our decision by our own. My advice to you….keep marks aside go in search of your interest….think like if math and science are two yummy food dishes which will be your favourite..hmm jokes apart…. Decide your subject based on your aim or goal what you wanna do for whole your life…. Scoring in 10th not a big deal…so keep class 10th marks aside and ask to yourself is math your strenght or science… if you cannot find answer attend career guidance seminar either online or offline or consult your elders or teachers that what are you best in…. Choose something that fir that you will never ever regret in future….. And whatever you choose put your all efforts in that field and belive me you will shine like a dimond in the thing you gonna persue!!!! Thank you for reading my answer…. All the best!!!! Make a wise choice

Hey there, My advice would be to not decide based on marks and availability. These two years should ideally form a nice base for your college career. Consider your long term goals and focus on subjects that you feel you would be forced to encounter later on. So if you're planning to take Maths in the future but not any other subject in the science stream then don't take the science stream. Take some other stream that offers maths and maybe other subjects that you will compulsorily learn when you take math in college like computer science. All that said, these are 2 very important years in your schooling education- whatever you decide to take, take them seriously and endeavour to give your best. Hope this helped and All the best!
